1.text: Mix all the ingredients into a bowl.

2.text: Place the clay and food colouring on top of the ball of slime.

3.text: Knead the ingredients together with your hands.

4.text: Stir the PVA glue and borax in a bowl.

5.text: Add the modelling clay to the bowl.

6.text: Mix the ingredients with your hands until they form a ball.

7.text: Measure the cornstarch and shampoo into a bowl.

8.text: Stir the ingredients until they reach a paste consistency.

9.text: Mix baby oil and yellow food colouring into the slime.
